title: RHOBH Howling at Sue Recap + Bershan Shaw (RHONY)
itunes:title: RHOBH Howling at Sue Recap + Bershan Shaw (RHONY)
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, which featured more Bamboozle Jayne info coming out, runny mascara, Queen Kathy howling at her dog Sue and making crazy/beautiful wreaths, Rinna's daughter's hot new man, and...
description:
Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, which featured more Bamboozle Jayne info coming out, runny mascara, Queen Kathy howling at her dog Sue and making crazy/beautiful wreaths, Rinna's daughter's hot new man, and so much more! After the recap, Danny chats with Bershan Shaw, the newest cast member on The Real Housewives of New York. They discuss Bershan joining the show, her relationship with Sonja, and lots more!


Bershan Shaw Interview: 35:20ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
